articles.title: Arnaud Natal
articles.contents:
Arnaud Natal
          
          
            
              
              Hi! Welcome to my page!
              I am a Ph.D. Student at the Economics departement (BSE) of the
              University of Bordeaux in France, and affiliated to the
              the French Institute
              of Pondicherry (IFP) in India, through the Observatory of Rural
              Dynamics and Inequalities in South India (ODRIIS). I
              am involved in the development of the NEEMSIS
              longitudinal survey since 2019.
              I am currently in India until August 2023.
              My main field of interest is Development Economics, and
              I work on topics related to household indebtedness, labour
              market, and cognitive skills/personality traits in rural
              South India, using the RUME
              and NEEMSIS
              datasets.

articles.title: Arnaud Natal
articles.description:
**Ph.D. Candidate in Economics**

Fields of interest:
Development economics, household finances, behavioural economics, microeconomics
